question:
According to you, what is the bigger,classroom or canteen?
(make the complete sentence )​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I think, the classroom is bigger than the canteen

related_questions.question: tolong buatlah 5 kalimat Simple Present Tense ( pakai kata kerja / verbs ) bentuk positive ( + ), bentuk negative ( - ), bentuk interrogative ( ? ) beserta jawabannya

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Simple Present Tense:

(+) S + V1 (+s/es)

(-) S + do/does + not + Infinitive

(?) Do/does + S + Infintive

1. (+) She loves English

(-) She does not love English

(?) does she love English ?

2. (+) You are my best friend

(-) You are not my best friend

(?) are you my best friend ?

3. (+) I know who you are

(-) I do not know who you are

(?) do i know who you are ?

4. (+) they love their mother

(-) they do not love their mother

(?) Do they love their mother?

5. (+) you are sleepy

(-) you are not sleepy

(?) Are you sleepy ?

*jadikan brainliest ya

cmiiw

I never pray every night
Am i pray every night?

(-) i never pray every night
(?) do i pray every night

Jawaban:

The teacher gave some work yesterday

Penjelasan:

Karena kata give nya di kurung jadi saya pikir harus diubah menjadi past tense ^^

Semoga bermanfaat ^^

-Lily ✨

Jawaban:

The teacher gave some works yesterday

Penjelasan:

Kita menggunakan past tense jika waktu sudah lewat, misal nya I ate this food yesterday, otomatis kan sudh kemarin jadi pakai pas tense

Maaf kalau salah yaa\

-Clarissa

Jawaban:

contoh present continuous:

I am eating

he is playing basket ball

me and my family are visiting our uncle home

Penjelasan:

Rumus: S + to be + Verb-ing

Present Continuous Tense bisa digunakan untuk menceritakan sebuah kejadian atau kegiatan yang dilakukan dalam kurun waktu tertentu dan masih berlangsung sampai sekarang.

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

we went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

past tense jd v2

Jawaban:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

Past tense merupakan kata yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan kejadian yang telah terjadi di masa lampau.

Perbedaannya dengan present tense adalah verb yang digunakan.

Present tense menggunakan verb 1, dan past tense menggunakan verb 2.

Maka verb 2 dari go adalah:

go → went

Past Tense Sentences:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

related_questions.question:
Terjemahkan dengan menggunakan tenses yang tepat    A. Andi memberi makan kucingnya 3 hari yang lalu sebelum kucingnya hilang
B. Jill telah mengemudi selaman enam tahun
C. Sam tidak menghadiri kelas matematika kemarin​

answers.answer:

A. Andi fed his cat 3 days ago before the cat disappeared

A. Andi fed his cat 3 days ago before the cat disappearedB. Jill has been driving for six years
